s: This was my first set of clay cutters and I love them. This set has the most popular shapes and are great for starting off with since the styles you can make with it are the ones most commonly worn. The cutters are easy to hold and press down with. They do not get stained and are easy to clean. Some other cutters I’ve gotten from other brands ...
